description:
You can tell right away that Spike likes to have a good time, loves to laugh, and is very mischievous! (And maybe a little stoned?)
He is one of those dudes that has always wanted to porn, but is not finding a lot of opportunity to do straight porn. Pretty sure he thinks he has a good chance of getting into straight films, so not sure if he will be back to play with some boys.
He is pretty focused on the porn playing (not really a lot of showmanship) so it is more of a "fly on the wall" type of video. And his facial expressions, though a bit goofy, shows his intent on jacking off.
It's kind of a funny video actually. Some humorous moments, with a giant glob of cum for an ending. It's like a straight dude wandered in and just rubbed one off.
title: Spike - Solo
